cast.name: 里卡尔多·穆蒂 Riccardo Muti
维也纳爱乐乐团 Wiener Philharmoniker

introduction: The 2021 Vienna Philharmonic New Year's Concert takes place on January 1, 2021, under the baton of Riccardo Muti in the Golden Hall of the Musikverein in Vienna. After 1993, 1997, 2000, 2004, and 2018, this year's concert will mark the 6th time that Riccardo Muti, whose close musical partnership with the Vienna Philharmonic has now extended nearly 50 years, conducts this prestigious concert event.The 2021 New Year's Concert will be broadcast in over 90 countries and followed by millions of television viewers around the world. The 2021 New Year's Concert will take place without an audience.PROGRAMFranz von SuppèFatinitza MarchJohann Strauß II.Schallwellen (Sound Waves), Waltz, op. 148Johann Strauß II.Niko Polka, op. 228Josef StraußOhne Sorgen (Without a Care), Fast Polka, op. 271Carl ZellerGrubenlichter (Davy Lamps), WaltzCarl MillöckerIn Saus und Braus (Living It Up), Galop-- INTERMISSION --Franz von SuppèOverture to "Poet and Peasant"Karl KomzákBad’ner Mad’ln (Girls of Baden), Waltz, op. 257Josef StraußMargherita Polka, op. 244Johann Strauß I.Venetian Galop, op. 74Johann Strauß II.Frühlingsstimmen (Voices of Spring), Waltz, op. 410Johann Strauß II.In the Krapfenwaldl, Polka française, op. 336Johann Strauß II.New Melodies Quadrille. op. 254Johann Strauß II.Emperor Waltz, op. 437Johann Strauß II.Tempestuous in Love and Dance, Fast Polka, op. 393
